caption.p: Template-based structure modeling of pUL15. ( A) Superimposition of pUL15 domains onto the template structure. A superimposition of 4iox (purple) and 2o0j (yellow) onto 3cpe (gray) was used to create the pUL15 model shown in ( B). A hinge region linking the two domains of pUL15 is colored in green.
